description: Nicolas Sarkozy has gone on trial accused of corruption linked to his 2007 campaign funding.
title: Trial of ex-president Sarkozy a landmark for France
title_page: Trial of ex-president Sarkozy a landmark for France - BBC News
maintext: In a separate case, he is due to go on trial from 17 March to 15 April 2021 over the so-called Bygmalion affair, in which he is accused of having fraudulently overspent in his 2012 presidential campaign. His 2012 re-election bid was unsuccessful.
